title: Zac croma pack skin bug Patch 7.10

embed.description: i played Zac on ranked and i found a bug that Zac R animation stuck on the player in the game It was very funny :D

body: So i was playing in ranked game yesterday with zac after the patch and in the game on the bot lane bush i used my R and i had three enemies with me and i die when i was jumping to the dragon and after that the animation of  the R stuck on my player for all the game and when i had low hp i had problem of looking on my player so i can use the ability's on the enemies it was realy funny but it was on ranked game and i didn't  like it to loose LP cause of  but visibility i used the croma pack the orange one.

replies.body:
Hey Worst Yi EUNE (Are you really tho?)

Thanks for reporting this! The issue was actually affecting Zac as a champion, not just the chroma packs! We issued a micropatch last night, which resolved this issue. Everything should be working properly again on live!
